headline: Phillips 66 to speak at Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference
summary: HOUSTON, December 18, 2025--Mark Lashier, chairman and CEO of Phillips 66, will participate in a fireside chat at the Goldman Sachs Energy, CleanTech & Utilities Conference.

headline: Activist investor Elliott Management acquires $1bn Lululemon stake
summary: Elliott is preparing to push to change the company’s CEO.

headline: Lululemon Faces Activist Pressure as Elliott Takes $1 Billion Stake
summary: Elliott eyes leadership change amid CEO exit and stock slump.
